Description: Fire protection engineering design - Fire Protection Design Drawing Set
Notes: Fire water loop layout; hydrant locations; fire alarm system drawings; foam system layouts; typical 8-12 sheets

Description: Fire protection engineering design - Fire Protection Technical Specification
Notes: Fire water piping spec; fire hydrant spec; fire alarm spec; foam system spec; NFPA 30/24/72/11 compliance

Description: Fire protection engineering design - Fire Protection Design Calculations
Notes: Fire water demand calcs per NFPA 30; hydraulic calcs per NFPA 24; foam system sizing per NFPA 11/16

Description: Fire protection engineering design - Fire Protection Data Sheet Package
Notes: Fire hydrant data sheets (8-12); fire alarm panel data sheet; foam equipment data sheets

Description: Fire water piping - underground ductile iron
Notes: Ductile iron pipe DN150-DN300 (500-800 LM) with cement-mortar lining; polyethylene wrap; fittings; valve boxes; per AWWA C151
Steel pipe Schedule 40 DN100-DN200 (200-400 LM); fittings; supports; fire protection paint; per ASTM A53
Dry-barrel fire hydrants (8-12 units) rated -40C; 2x2.5in + 1x4.5in outlets; valve boxes; FDC (2 units); hose bibs
Gate valves OS&Y (12-18); PIV valves (4-6); check valves (2-4); valve markers; fittings per AWWA C509

Description: Fire alarm control panel and equipment
Notes: Addressable FACP per ULC-S527; network interface for DCS integration; battery backup; annunciator panels
Heat detectors (40-60); flame detectors UV/IR (15-25); smoke detectors (10-20); manual pull stations (20-30); per ULC standards
Horn/strobes (40-60 devices); fire alarm cable per ULC-S139; conduit; junction boxes; weatherproof enclosures
Foam concentrate tank (2000-4000 gal); bladder tank proportioner or balanced pressure system; foam concentrate (AR-AFFF 3%)
Foam chambers or foam makers for 3 x 15000 MT tanks; foam piping to tanks; control valves; per NFPA 11
Foam monitors or nozzles for marine loading platform; foam piping; quick-disconnect fittings; control valves
Trench excavation (700-1200 LM); pipe laying and jointing; valve installation; thrust blocks; backfill; coordination with PKG-03
Hydrant installation (8-12 units); concrete pads; valve box installation; FDC installation; marking posts
FACP installation; detector mounting; device wiring; conduit installation; terminations; programming; coordination with PKG-19
Foam tank installation; proportioner installation; foam piping to tanks and marine loading; foam chamber mounting; controls
CI = 0.18 x CD ($600k); includes site supervision; temporary facilities; HSE; QA/QC field inspection; per fallback typical model
P = 0.02 x MAT ($1065k); includes fire protection equipment sourcing; vendor coordination; expediting; per fallback typical model
PM = 0.06 x (CD + CI + MAT) ($1773k); includes project management; engineering management; coordination; per fallback typical model
COM = 0.03 x (CD + CI + MAT) ($1773k); includes hydrostatic testing; flow testing; fire alarm testing; foam system testing; per DEL-23.05 scope
